name: Alone in the World
description:
A game developed in TyranoBuilder for the TyranoBuilder Spring Jam 2017.

Did you ever imagine the possibility of being the last human being on earth?

Alone in the World embraces this perspective. It is a short story about the last two people in earth. It brings, though, a mix of drama, romance and comedy to tell a heartwarming story about two people that only have each other.
